sentence.Network_en: I gestured towards the boathouse, and he looked inside.
sentence.Network_cn: 我朝船库方向示意，他便往里面瞧了瞧。

sentence.Network_en: Sometimes, an entire boathouse is turned into a dwelling.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时, 整个船库都变成了一座寓所.

sentence.Network_en: An old boathouse has been converted into a three - bedroomed cottage.
sentence.Network_cn: 老船坞已变为一个拥有三间卧室的小农舍.

entry.def: A boathouse is a building at the edge of a lake, in which boats are kept.

means.word_mean: 1. a house at edge of river or lake; used to store boats
